Articles.Content:
It is a sad day a very sad day, Jeb has tragically died

On his very first mission, (to orbit the sun) Jeb's decupler malfunctioned, leaving just him and his pod, he thought he would make the best out of the situation and catch some rays, but the pod was so light it was moving fast, Jeb tried to chase it but he couldn't catch it, After 10 rescue missions failed, 30 dead Kerbals, we lost contact with Jeb.[ATTACH=CONFIG]31813[/ATTACH]

RIP JEB 23/08/12-23/08/12
Jeb Never dies! Stop spreading negative propaganda!
It's okay, we can rebuild him. We have the technology.
